General.Name: Shanghai AtHub Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai @hub Co.,Ltd. provides data center server hosting services in China and internationally. The company offers wholesale data center services, including data center planning, and design and operational service level requirements; and retail data center services, such as server hosting services and network bandwidth services. It also provides cloud services and products, and design planning consulting, project management, data center overall solution business, data center transformation business, third-party managed services, etc. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
